summary: Started application servers in background mode without interference. Backend server running on port 8001 (PID: 81621), Frontend Expo server running (PID: 81819). Both servers are running in background with logs redirected to logs/backend.log and logs/frontend.log. Servers started successfully and are accessible. Application startup completed successfully.
current_status: Application running in background. Backend: ✅ Running on http://localhost:8001 (PID: 81621). Frontend: ✅ Running (PID: 81819). Logs available in logs/ directory. Servers can be stopped using: kill $(cat logs/backend.pid) $(cat logs/frontend.pid). Next steps: (1) Monitor logs for any issues, (2) Test API endpoints, (3) Access frontend via Expo.
